    <sys_script_fix action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <before>false</before>
        <description>Change the field label to type translated_field and description to translated_text</description>
        <name>Update datastream template fields</name>
        <record_for_rollback>false</record_for_rollback>
        <script><![CDATA[(function () {
    var gr = new GlideRecord('sys_dictionary');
	gr.addQuery('name', 'sys_hub_pagination_templates');
	gr.addQuery('element', 'description');
	gr.addQuery('internal_type', 'string');
	gr.setWorkflow(false);
	gr.query();
	if (gr.next()) {
		gr.setValue('internal_type', 'translated_text');
		gr.update();
	}
	
	var gr2 = new GlideRecord('sys_dictionary');
	gr2.addQuery('name', 'sys_hub_pagination_templates');
	gr2.addQuery('element', 'label');
	gr2.addQuery('internal_type', 'string');
	gr2.setWorkflow(false);
	gr2.query();
	if (gr2.next()) {
		gr2.setValue('internal_type', 'translated_field');
		gr2.update();
	}

	
})();]]></script>
